overview: Kevin has served as the Vice President of Sales and Marketing with Vivonet since 2004. As the brand architect behind Halo Secure Web Based POS and the creator of Vivonetâ€™s software-as-a-service (SaaS) direct sales model, Kevin is passionate about continuing to build Vivonet as a world class SaaS company. Kevin is accountable for the delivery of organic recurring revenue growth and for transforming retailers into clients that are enthusiastic promoters for Vivonet. Additionally, Kevin is responsible for all aspects of branding, marketing, corporate communication and culture initiatives. Kevin has spent 13 years in business to business technology and previously has held senior management positions with Titan Corporation (now L-3 Communications NYSE: LLL) subsidiary Cayenta and Class Software Solutions (now Active.com). Kevin studied Kinesiology and Chemistry at Simon Fraser University.
